title: Adults-Only Private Island Paradise with All-Inclusive Meals and Daily Spa Treatments
description: Escape to Fiji’s exclusive Royal Davui Island Resort and experience opulence like never before. Dotting the South Pacific Ocean with its powdery white-sand beaches, vibrant palm trees and pristine aqua waters, this tropical escape oozes secluded romance adorned with five-star luxury. Indulge in all-inclusive meals-we’re talking breakfast, lunch, dinner and nightly sunset canapes-daily couples spa treatments, Discover Scuba dive package, welcome bottle of wine, guided island snorkeling and walking tours and so much more.
offer_address: Royal Davui Island, Beqa Lagoon, Fiji

title: Adults-Only Private Island Paradise with All-Inclusive Meals and Daily Spa Treatments
description: Escape to Fiji’s exclusive Royal Davui Island Resort and experience opulence like never before. Dotting the South Pacific Ocean with its powdery white-sand beaches, vibrant palm trees and pristine aqua waters, this tropical escape oozes secluded romance adorned with barefoot luxury. Indulge in all-inclusive meals with breakfast, lunch, dinner and nightly sunset canapés, daily couples spa treatments, your choice of a Discover Scuba dive package or a romantic private dinner, a VIP welcome with a lei and drink, welcome bottle of champagne and so much more.
offer_address: Royal Davui Island, Beqa Lagoon, Fiji

title: Five-Star Fiji Adults-Only Pool Bungalows on Exclusive Private Island
description: Enter a world of intimate, high-end opulence at the adults-only Royal Davui Island Resort, a 10-acre private island where laidback life meets celebrity-grade service. Hidden in the azure Beqa Lagoon of the South Pacific Ocean, the island’s powdery white-sand beaches, vibrant palm trees and pristine waters ooze secluded romance and Fijian indulgence. Think barefoot luxury, intimate dining experiences, ancient spa rituals, private plunge pools and a tropical marine reserve just waiting to be explored. With only 16 exquisitely appointed private bungalows and villas, Royal Davui Island Resort offers an exclusive, once-in-a-lifetime experience from the moment of arrival.
offer_address: Royal Davui Island, Beqa Lagoon, Fiji
